metadata.title: CVE-2024-26677 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:rxrpc: Fix delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial numberFix the construction of delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial numberas they can't be used as an RTT reference.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
